import { useSelector } from "react-redux" import { useDispatch } from "react-redux" import { setNotificationCenter } from "../store/slices/slice" function NotificationCenter(){ const notificationCenter=useSelector(state=>state.global.notificationCenter) const dispatch=useDispatch() return(

Notification Center

dispatch(setNotificationCenter(!notificationCenter))}/>
